snippet: Mark Kantrowitz, an expert on paying for college and the founder of FinAid.org, is answering questions from readers of The Choice about financial aid applications.
abstract: Mark Kantrowitz, an expert on paying for college and the founder of FinAid.org, is answering questions from readers of The Choice about financial aid applications.
lead_paragraph: 10:28 a.m. | Updated We are no longer accepting questions for this feature.

headline.main: Part 3: Answers on the Fafsa, the Free Application for Federal Student Aid
